item.text: After the plague the Lord said to Moses and to Eleazar son of Aaron the priest,

“<st data-num="05375" class="">Take</st> a <st data-num="07218" class="">census</st> of the <st data-num="03605" class="">whole</st> <st data-num="05712" class="">community</st> of <st data-num="01121 03478">Israelites</st>, from <st data-num="06242" class="">twenty</st> <st data-num="08141" class="">years</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">old</st> and <st data-num="04605" class="">upward</st>, by their <st data-num="01004 01">clans</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="03605" class="">everyone</st> who can <st data-num="03318" class="">serve</st> in the <st data-num="06635" class="">army</st> of <st data-num="03478" class="">Israel</st>.”<n id="2" />

So <st data-num="04872" class="">Moses</st> and <st data-num="0499" class="">Eleazar</st> the <st data-num="03548" class="">priest</st> <st data-num="01696" class="">spoke</st> <st data-num="0854" class="">with</st> them in the <st data-num="06160" class="">rift valley plains</st><n id="1" /> of <st data-num="04124" class="">Moab</st>, <st data-num="05921" class="">along</st> the <st data-num="03383" class="">Jordan</st> River<n id="2" /> across from <st data-num="03405" class="">Jericho</st>.<n id="3" /> They <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st>,
“Number the people from twenty years old and upward, just as the Lord commanded Moses and the Israelites who went out from the land of Egypt.”
Reuben was the firstborn of Israel. The Reubenites: from Hanoch, the family of the Hanochites; from Pallu, the family of the Palluites;

from <st data-num="02696" class="">Hezron</st>, the <st data-num="04940" class="">family</st> of the <st data-num="02697" class="">Hezronites</st>; from <st data-num="03756" class="">Carmi</st>, the <st data-num="04940" class="">family</st> of the <st data-num="03757" class="">Carmites</st>.

<st data-num="0428" class="">These</st> were the <st data-num="04940" class="">families</st> of the <st data-num="07206" class="">Reubenites</st>; and those <st data-num="06485" class="">numbered</st> of them <st data-num="01961" class="">were</st> <st data-num="07969 0705 0505 07651 03967 07970">43,730</st>.
<st data-num="06396" class="">Pallu’s</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">descendant</st><n id="1" /> was <st data-num="0446" class="">Eliab</st>.

Eliab’s descendants were Nemuel, Dathan, and Abiram. It was Dathan and Abiram who as leaders of the community rebelled against Moses and Aaron with the followers of Korah when they rebelled against the Lord.

The <st data-num="0776" class="">earth</st> <st data-num="06605" class="">opened</st> its <st data-num="06310" class="">mouth</st> and <st data-num="01104" class="">swallowed</st> them and <st data-num="07141" class="">Korah</st> at the time that <st data-num="05712" class="">company</st> <st data-num="04194" class="">died</st>, when the <st data-num="0784" class="">fire</st> <st data-num="0398" class="">consumed</st> <st data-num="02572 03967">250</st> <st data-num="0376" class="">men</st>. So they <st data-num="01961" class="">became</st> a <st data-num="05251" class="">warning</st>.
But the descendants of Korah did not die.
The Simeonites by their families: from Nemuel, the family of the Nemuelites; from Jamin, the family of the Jaminites; from Jakin, the family of the Jakinites;

from <st data-num="02226" class="">Zerah</st>,<n id="1" /> the <st data-num="04940" class="">family</st> of the <st data-num="02227" class="">Zerahites</st>; and from <st data-num="07586" class="">Shaul</st>, the <st data-num="04940" class="">family</st> of the <st data-num="07587" class="">Shaulites</st>.
These were the families of the Simeonites, 22,200.
The Gadites by their families: from Zephon, the family of the Zephonites; from Haggi, the family of the Haggites; from Shuni, the family of the Shunites;

from <st data-num="0244" class="">Ozni</st>,<n id="1" /> the <st data-num="04940" class="">family</st> of the <st data-num="0244" class=""> Oznites</st>; from <st data-num="06179" class="">Eri</st>,<n id="2" /> the <st data-num="04940" class="">family</st> of the <st data-num="06180" class="">Erites</st>;

from <st data-num="0720" class="">Arod</st>,<n id="1" /> the <st data-num="04940" class="">family</st> of the <st data-num="0722" class="">Arodites</st>; and from <st data-num="0692" class="">Areli</st>, the <st data-num="04940" class="">family</st> of the <st data-num="0692" class="">Arelites</st>.
These were the families of the Gadites according to those numbered of them, 40,500.
The descendants of Judah were Er and Onan, but Er and Onan died in the land of Canaan.

And the <st data-num="01121 03063">Judahites</st> by their <st data-num="04940" class="">families</st> <st data-num="01961" class="">were</st>: from <st data-num="07956" class="">Shelah</st>, the <st data-num="04940" class="">family</st> of the <st data-num="08024" class="">Shelahites</st>; from <st data-num="06557" class="">Perez</st>, the <st data-num="04940" class="">family</st> of the <st data-num="06558" class="">Perezites</st>; and from <st data-num="02226" class="">Zerah</st>, the <st data-num="04940" class="">family</st> of the <st data-num="02227" class="">Zerahites</st>.

And the <st data-num="01121 06557">Perezites</st> <st data-num="01961" class="">were</st>: from <st data-num="02696" class="">Hezron</st>, the <st data-num="04940" class="">family</st> of the <st data-num="02697" class="">Hezronites</st>; from <st data-num="02538" class="">Hamul</st>,<n id="1" /> the <st data-num="04940" class="">family</st> of the <st data-num="02539" class="">Hamulites</st>.
These were the families of Judah according to those numbered of them, 76,500.
The Issacharites by their families: from Tola, the family of the Tolaites; from Puah, the family of the Puites;

from <st data-num="03437" class="">Jashub</st>, the <st data-num="04940" class="">family</st> of the <st data-num="03432" class="">Jashubites</st>; and from <st data-num="08110" class="">Shimron</st>, the <st data-num="04940" class="">family</st> of the <st data-num="08117" class="">Shimronites</st>.
These were the families of Issachar, according to those numbered of them, 64,300.
The Zebulunites by their families: from Sered, the family of the Sardites; from Elon, the family of the Elonites; from Jahleel, the family of the Jahleelites.
These were the families of the Zebulunites, according to those numbered of them, 60,500.
The descendants of Joseph by their families: Manasseh and Ephraim.

The <st data-num="01121 04519">Manassehites</st>: from <st data-num="04353" class="">Machir</st>, the <st data-num="04940" class="">family</st> of the <st data-num="04354" class="">Machirites</st> (now <st data-num="04353" class="">Machir</st> <st data-num="03205">became the father</st> of <st data-num="01568" class="">Gilead</st>); from <st data-num="01568" class="">Gilead</st>, the <st data-num="04940" class="">family</st> of the <st data-num="01569" class="">Gileadites</st>.

<st data-num="0428" class="">These</st> were the <st data-num="01121 01568">Gileadites</st>: from <st data-num="0372" class="">Iezer</st>, the <st data-num="04940" class="">family</st> of the <st data-num="0373" class="">Iezerites</st>; from <st data-num="02507" class="">Helek</st>, the <st data-num="04940" class="">family</st> of the <st data-num="02516" class="">Helekites</st>;

from <st data-num="0844" class="">Asriel</st>, the <st data-num="04940" class="">family</st> of the <st data-num="0845" class="">Asrielites</st>; from <st data-num="07928" class="">Shechem</st>, the <st data-num="04940" class="">family</st> of the <st data-num="07930" class="">Shechemites</st>;

from <st data-num="08061" class="">Shemida</st>, the <st data-num="04940" class="">family</st> of the <st data-num="08062" class="">Shemidaites</st>; from <st data-num="02660" class="">Hepher</st>, the <st data-num="04940" class="">family</st> of the <st data-num="02662" class="">Hepherites</st>.

Now <st data-num="06765" class="">Zelophehad</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="02660" class="">Hepher</st> <st data-num="01961" class="">had</st> <st data-num="03808" class="">no</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">sons</st>, <st data-num="03588" class="">but</st> <st data-num="0518" class="">only</st> <st data-num="01323" class="">daughters</st>; and the <st data-num="08034" class="">names</st> of the <st data-num="01323" class="">daughters</st> of <st data-num="06765" class="">Zelophehad</st> were <st data-num="04244" class="">Mahlah</st>, <st data-num="05270" class="">Noah</st>, <st data-num="02295" class="">Hoglah</st>, <st data-num="04435" class="">Milcah</st>, and <st data-num="08656" class="">Tirzah</st>.
These were the families of Manasseh; those numbered of them were 52,700.
These are the Ephraimites by their families: from Shuthelah, the family of the Shuthelahites; from Beker, the family of the Bekerites; from Tahan, the family of the Tahanites.

Now <st data-num="0428" class="">these</st> were the <st data-num="01121 07803">Shuthelahites</st>: from <st data-num="06197" class="">Eran</st>, the <st data-num="04940" class="">family</st> of the <st data-num="06198" class="">Eranites</st>.
These were the families of the Ephraimites, according to those numbered of them, 32,500. These were the descendants of Joseph by their families.
The Benjaminites by their families: from Bela, the family of the Belaites; from Ashbel, the family of the Ashbelites; from Ahiram, the family of the Ahiramites;

from <st data-num="08197" class="">Shupham</st>,<n id="1" /> the <st data-num="04940" class="">family</st> of the <st data-num="07781" class="">Shuphamites</st>; from <st data-num="02349" class="">Hupham</st>, the <st data-num="04940" class="">family</st> of the <st data-num="02350" class="">Huphamites</st>.

The <st data-num="01121" class="">descendants</st> of <st data-num="01106" class="">Bela</st> <st data-num="01961" class="">were</st> <st data-num="0714" class="">Ard</st><n id="1" /> and <st data-num="05283" class="">Naaman</st>. From Ard,<n id="2" /> the <st data-num="04940" class="">family</st> of the <st data-num="0716" class="">Ardites</st>; from <st data-num="05283" class="">Naaman</st>, the <st data-num="04940" class="">family</st> of the <st data-num="05280" class="">Naamanites</st>.
These are the Benjaminites, according to their families, and according to those numbered of them, 45,600.
These are the Danites by their families: from Shuham, the family of the Shuhamites. These were the families of Dan, according to their families.
All the families of the Shuhamites according to those numbered of them were 64,400.
The Asherites by their families: from Imnah, the family of the Imnahites; from Ishvi, the family of the Ishvites; from Beriah, the family of the Beriahites.

From the <st data-num="01121 01283">Beriahites</st>: from <st data-num="02268" class="">Heber</st>, the <st data-num="04940" class="">family</st> of the <st data-num="02277" class="">Heberites</st>; from <st data-num="04439" class="">Malkiel</st>, the <st data-num="04940" class="">family</st> of the <st data-num="04440" class="">Malkielites</st>.
Now the <st data-num="08034" class="">name</st> of the <st data-num="01323" class="">daughter</st> of <st data-num="0836" class="">Asher</st> was <st data-num="08294" class="">Serah</st>.<n id="1" />
These are the families of the Asherites, according to those numbered of them, 53,400.
The Naphtalites by their families: from Jahzeel, the family of the Jahzeelites; from Guni, the family of the Gunites;

from <st data-num="03337" class="">Jezer</st>, the <st data-num="04940" class="">family</st> of the <st data-num="03339" class="">Jezerites</st>; from <st data-num="08006" class="">Shillem</st>, the <st data-num="04940" class="">family</st> of the <st data-num="08016" class="">Shillemites</st>.
These were the families of Naphtali according to their families; and those numbered of them were 45,400.
These were those numbered of the Israelites, 601,730.
Then the Lord spoke to Moses:

“To <st data-num="0428" class="">these</st> the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> must be <st data-num="02505" class="">divided</st> as an <st data-num="05159" class="">inheritance</st> according to the <st data-num="04557" class="">number</st> of the <st data-num="08034" class="">names</st>.

To a <st data-num="07227" class="">larger</st> group you will <st data-num="07235" class="">give a larger</st> <st data-num="05159" class="">inheritance</st>,<n id="1" /> and to a <st data-num="04592" class="">smaller</st> group you will <st data-num="04591" class="">give a smaller</st> <st data-num="05159" class="">inheritance</st>.<n id="2" /> To <st data-num="0376" class="">each one</st> its <st data-num="05159" class="">inheritance</st> must be <st data-num="05414" class="">given</st> <st data-num="06310" class="">according</st> to the <st data-num="06485" class="">number of people</st> in it.<n id="3" />

The <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> <st data-num="0389" class="">must</st> be <st data-num="02505" class="">divided</st> by <st data-num="01486" class="">lot</st>; and they will <st data-num="05157" class="">inherit</st> in accordance with the <st data-num="08034" class="">names</st> of their <st data-num="01" class="">ancestral</st> <st data-num="04294" class="">tribes</st>.
Their inheritance must be apportioned by lot among the larger and smaller groups.”

And these are the Levites who were numbered according to their families: from Gershon, the family of the Gershonites; of Kohath, the family of the Kohathites; from Merari, the family of the Merarites.

<st data-num="0428" class="">These</st> are the <st data-num="04940" class="">families</st> of the <st data-num="03881" class="">Levites</st>: the <st data-num="04940" class="">family</st> of the <st data-num="03846" class="">Libnites</st>, the <st data-num="04940" class="">family</st> of the <st data-num="02276" class="">Hebronites</st>, the <st data-num="04940" class="">family</st> of the <st data-num="04250" class="">Mahlites</st>, the <st data-num="04940" class="">family</st> of the <st data-num="04188" class="">Mushites</st>, the <st data-num="04940" class="">family</st> of the <st data-num="07145" class="">Korahites</st>. <st data-num="06955" class="">Kohath</st> <st data-num="03205" class="">became the father</st> of <st data-num="06019" class="">Amram</st>.

Now the <st data-num="08034" class="">name</st> of <st data-num="06019" class="">Amram’s</st> <st data-num="0802" class="">wife</st> was <st data-num="03115" class="">Jochebed</st>, <st data-num="01323" class="">daughter</st> of <st data-num="03878" class="">Levi</st>, <st data-num="0834" class="">who</st> was <st data-num="03205" class="">born</st><n id="1" /> to <st data-num="03878" class="">Levi</st> in <st data-num="04714" class="">Egypt</st>. And to <st data-num="06019" class="">Amram</st> she <st data-num="03205" class="">bore</st> <st data-num="0175" class="">Aaron</st>, <st data-num="04872" class="">Moses</st>, and <st data-num="04813" class="">Miriam</st> their <st data-num="0269" class="">sister</st>.

And to <st data-num="0175" class="">Aaron</st> were <st data-num="03205" class="">born</st> <st data-num="05070" class="">Nadab</st> and <st data-num="030" class="">Abihu</st>, <st data-num="0499" class="">Eleazar</st> and <st data-num="0385" class="">Ithamar</st>.
But Nadab and Abihu died when they offered strange fire before the Lord.
Those of the Levites who were numbered were 23,000, all males from a month old and upward, for they were not numbered among the Israelites; no inheritance was given to them among the Israelites.
These are those who were numbered by Moses and Eleazar the priest, who numbered the Israelites in the rift valley plains of Moab along the Jordan River opposite Jericho.

But there <st data-num="01961" class="">was</st> <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> a <st data-num="0376" class="">man</st> among <st data-num="0428" class="">these</st> who had been<n id="1" /> among those <st data-num="06485" class="">numbered</st> by <st data-num="04872" class="">Moses</st> and <st data-num="0175" class="">Aaron</st> the <st data-num="03548" class="">priest</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">when</st> they <st data-num="06485" class="">numbered</st> the <st data-num="01121 03478">Israelites</st> in the <st data-num="04057" class="">desert</st> of <st data-num="05514" class="">Sinai</st>.
For the Lord had said of them, “They will surely die in the wilderness.” And there was not left a single man of them, except Caleb son of Jephunneh and Joshua son of Nun.
